title: ipv4-addr
description: The IPv4 Address Object represents one or more IPv4 addresses expressed using CIDR notation.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `ipv4-addr`.

value.description: Specifies one or more IPv4 addresses expressed using CIDR notation.

resolves_to_refs.description: Specifies a list of references to one or more Layer 2 Media Access Control (MAC) addresses that the IPv4 address resolves to.

belongs_to_refs.description: Specifies a reference to one or more autonomous systems (AS) that the IPv4 address belongs to.

type.description: Indicates that this object is an Observable Object. The value of this property MUST be a valid Observable Object type name, but to allow for custom objects this has been removed from the schema.

description.description: Specifies a textual description of the Object.

extensions.description: Specifies any extensions of the object, as a dictionary.
